item.title: Solana Ecosystem AI Game "AI Nyan Mine" Officially Launched
item.description: On August 16th, the first Web3 + AI nurturing game launched by the CAT Terminal community - CAT Crew "AI Meow Mining" - officially went live.The CAT Terminal community held the global launch event of "AI Meow Mining" in Dubai, with the support of well-known Middle Eastern crypto organizations such as OOKC and X3 Labs. It attracted hundreds of Web3 enthusiasts from around the world to participate.Before the official launch, "AI Meow Mining" had completed two rounds of public testing. Over 3,000 players participated and the total feeding amount exceeded 100 million CAT tokens. The debut of CAT Crew has brought in a new MEME 2.0 gameplay, providing users with an unprecedented on-chain interactive experience.As of the time of writing, CAT's market capitalization is approximately $18 million and the number of holders has reached 6,900.

item.title: Ukrainian President's Advisor: Ending the Russia-Ukraine Conflict Requires Ceasefire Before Negotiation
item.description: August 16th. Serhiy Leshchenko, the Chief Advisor to the Office of the President of Ukraine, made a statement on social media on August 16th about the ways and means to end the Russia-Ukraine conflict. Leshchenko stated that Ukraine is firmly convinced that a ceasefire must be achieved first before moving on to further negotiation processes.Leshchenko explicitly pointed out that Ukraine's stance is very clear, that is, ceasefire first and then other discussions. The reason for this is that if negotiations are begun before a ceasefire, Ukraine will be exposed to a huge ransom risk. Only by successfully achieving a ceasefire can the necessary space for diplomatic activities be created. (Sina Finance)

item.title: Over the last 24 hours, CEX net outflow of 1,435.75 BTC
item.description: On August 16th, based on Coinglass data, in the past 24 hours, CEX has witnessed a total net outflow of 1,435.75 BTC. The top three exchanges with outflows are as follows:· Coinbase Pro, with an outflow of 1,023.19 BTC;· OKX, with an outflow of 585.67 BTC;· Gemini, with an outflow of 482.79 BTC.In addition, Bitfinex saw an inflow of 242.98 BTC and ranked first in the inflow list.

item.title: After 5 years of inactivity, a whale holding nearly 24,000 BTC has transferred 3,000 BTC to a new address
item.description: On August 16th, as per lookonchain, an OG whale possessing 23,969 BTC (valued at $2.82 billion) that had been dormant for 5 years transferred 3,000 BTC (worth $353.16 million) to a new wallet 2 hours ago.

item.title: OKB Price Surges Over 14% in 24 Hours, Market Cap Reaches $2.296 Billion
item.description: On August 16th, based on market data, OKB saw a surge of over 14% in the past 24 hours. Its market capitalization rebounded to $22.96 billion.

item.title: X Layer On-Chain Meme Coin XDOG Market Cap Surges Above $13 Million Temporarily
item.description: On August 16th, based on the market data from GMGN, the market capitalization of the XDOG meme coin on the X Layer chain briefly reached over 13 million US dollars, experiencing a 24-hour surge of 540%.BlockBeats reminds users that meme coin prices are extremely volatile. It is recommended to be cautious about asset protection and avoid the fear of missing out (FOMO).

item.title: Suspected Entity Withdraws Over 320,000 LINK from CEX After One-Month Dormancy, Worth $7.17 Million
item.description: On August 16th, based on the data from lookonchain, two wallets (presumably belonging to the same entity) withdrew 327,465 LINK from Binance after a month of inactivity. Currently, they are holding a total of 590,056 LINK, which is worth $12.92 million.

item.title: The address sold 5299.5 ETH at an average price of $4453, realizing a profit of $11.84 million.
item.description: August 16th. Based on ai_9684xtpa's monitoring, the address 0x90C...0a24C sold 5299.5 ETH on the blockchain at an average price of $4453 within the past 20 minutes, with a total value of approximately $23.6 million. The profit from this sale was $11.84 million. The funds originated from three addresses that accumulated 9154 ETH in batches with an average price of $2218.6 during the period of 2025.02-03.

item.title: If Ethereum surpasses $4550, the cumulative short liquidation pressure on major CEXs will reach $1.421 billion.
item.description: On August 16th, based on Coinglass data, if Ethereum breaks through $4550, the total short liquidation strength on mainstream CEXs will reach $1.421 billion.Conversely, if Ethereum drops below $4350, the total long liquidation strength on mainstream CEXs will reach $1.263 billion.BlockBeats Notes: The liquidation chart does not display the exact number of contracts to be liquidated or the exact value of contracts being liquidated. The bars on the liquidation chart actually represent the significance of each liquidation cluster in relation to adjacent clusters, that is, the strength.Therefore, the liquidation chart shows the extent to which reaching a certain price level will have an impact. A higher "liquidation bar" indicates that when the price reaches that level, a stronger reaction will occur due to a liquidity cascade.

item.title: Tiger Global Q2 Stake in Circle, Acquires 125,000 Class A Shares
item.description: August 16th. As per the disclosure by the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), Tiger Global Management submitted its second-quarter holdings report (13F) as of June 30, 2025. The figures indicate that Tiger Global's total holdings in the second quarter amounted to $34.1 billion, which is higher than the $26.6 billion in the previous quarter, representing a quarter-on-quarter growth of 28.2%.In the second quarter of 2025, Tiger Global newly purchased 125,000 shares of Class A stock of the stablecoin issuer Circle (CRCL.US). When Circle's stock went public in June, it performed well, and since then, its market value has almost increased by a factor of five from the initial public offering price.
